Summary: saucer shaped 80ft across stilth black large plasma ring on bottom of craft no sound.
trends: There have been 19 other sightings in Bremerton
There were no other sightings in Bremerton on or around July 13th 1956
divs: Sighting DetailsIt all started in the summer of 1956. I just went side to play. I was the side of the house and I just happen to look up and see this large silent craft moving just at tree top level not making a sound .it was moving towards me slowly then stopped just over me. On the bottom of the craft there was a large plasma looking ring. It was very bright , and moved like liqiud in a clockwise direction.so I just looked up and started at it. Then while I looked up at the craft I started getting lighter. As I started to lift up I thought it was neet until I was about 10ft or so in the airtheni began to panic. Say please don, t drop me .then I passed out I guess, the next thing I rremember I am laying on this table , or it looked liked like one. There was movement all around me but everthing seem blurry. There no color to anything it was all gray. The creatures around me were a grayish color but thats all remember. There was this metal arm that came toward my face like they were going to put something in me I said to them that that would hurt me and then I heard a voice say it won, t hurt or I thought I heard it my head maybe not sure. Then all I remember was that iwas back on the ground, by the house so I went into the house I guessm by the way there was no beam of light when I was lifted up. The next morning it s Sunday and I was sick all .
